column1: Complex Systems Modelling - from Biomedical & Natural to Economic & Social Sciences MSc
column3: Faculty of Natural and Mathematical Sciences
column5: Complex Systems Modelling MSc – from Biomedical & Natural to Economic & Social Sciences course will teach you to apply mathematical techniques in the rapidly developing and exciting interdisciplinary field of complex systems and examine how they apply to a variety of areas including biomedicine, nature, economics and social sciences. This research-led course is suitable for graduates who wish to work in research and development in an academic or industrial environment.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
